name: Morfix
overview: Published on the Beebug magazine subscribers’ disc, volume 4, issue 7, in December 1985. Later published on the 8BS Public Domain disc TBI-193, which was titled "PD Games #11". You take control of a blob and your mission is to reach your girlfriend (another blob), situated in one of the many "rooms". You have only three controls - left, right and jump. When you want to pick up an item, you must move over it.
